title: Synthesis and mutagenic risk of avanafil's potential genotoxic impurities
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21432-21438
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02345E, Paper

Yunkai Sun, Xiaoxia Wu, Pei Zuo, Zhao Liu, Xuepei Miao, Jian Liu, Hairuo Wen
Imp-E and Imp-F with altering hydrazide-structure were synthesized, which were determined to be negative for genotoxicity and could be controlled as class 5 in ICH M7.
